title: AI bots are worsening education in rural Colombia
description: Teachers say students are failing exams and graduating with few basic skills since the technology giant made artificial intelligence bots easily accessible.
content:
This article was originally published in Rest of World, which covers technology’s impact outside the West.

title: Weak productivity bites businesses, but AI is helping close the gap
description: Hamilton Jones, product manager at Intuit, says artificial intelligence can make a real difference for small and medium Australian businesses. AI agents can take on the routine and preparatory work that so often slows teams down. They provide recommendations, surface insights, and get work done within their areas of expertise — but nothing happens without permission. It’s about front-loading tasks so people can focus on the bigger picture.
content: For Econnex, productivity isn’t about replacing people, but redeploying them. “We’ve been able to trial and test where AI and humans each add the most value,” Jain says. “That’s allowed us to reduce our developer team by 20 per cent while transitioni... [3634 chars]

title: AI can aid, but not replace judicial wisdom, says CJ
description: PETALING JAYA: The rapid use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the legal system could never replace humans in judicial decision-making, says the Chief Justice.
content:
